the Internet giant. Eric Schmidt SELLS SHARES In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said., Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6 percent of the company's voting power.
